GSD.product_version: versions from v5.12 to before v5.15.51
GSD.description:
perf arm-spe: Don't set data source if it's not a memory operation

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.51 by commit 26e70f8989cb8dbdfe65d8b13824e67360fb2353, it was introduced in version v5.12 by commit e55ed3423c1bb29f97062f42ba3a94bbff5ab6a5. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: perf arm-spe: Don't set data source if it's not a memory operation
